verses.verse: I was glad<WH8055> when they said<WH559> to me,<WH3212> "Let's go to Yahweh<WH3068>'s house!<WH1004>"
Our feet<WH7272> are standing<WH5975> within your gates,<WH8179> Jerusalem;<WH3389>
Jerusalem,<WH3389> that is built<WH1129> as a city<WH5892> that is compact<WH2266> together;<WH3162>
where<WH8033> the tribes<WH7626> go up,<WH5927> even Yah<WH3050>'s tribes,<WH7626> according to an ordinance<WH5715> for Israel,<WH3478> to give thanks<WH3034> to the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
For there are set<WH3427> thrones<WH3678> for judgment,<WH4941> the thrones<WH3678> of David<WH1732>'s house.<WH1004>
Pray<WH7592> for the peace<WH7965> of Jerusalem.<WH3389> Those who love<WH157> you will prosper.<WH7951>
Peace<WH7965> be within your walls,<WH2426> and prosperity<WH7962> within your palaces.<WH759>
For my brothers<WH251>' and companions<WH7453>' sakes,<WH1696> I will now say, "Peace be within you.<WH7965>"
For the sake of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> I will seek<WH1245> your good.<WH2896>
